name: Postgres
semantic_context: Get, add and update data in Postgres
natural_language_description: 这是 Postgres 节点。主要用于: Get, add and update data in Postgres

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: insert
available_options: Execute Query (值: executeQuery) - Execute an SQL query
Insert (值: insert) - Insert rows in database
Update (值: update) - Update rows in database

query.name: query
query.description: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions or $1 and $2 in conjunction with query parameters.
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions or $1 and $2 in conjunction with query parameters. | (必填项)

schema.name: schema
schema.description: Name of the schema the table belongs to
schema.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema | 作用: Name of the schema the table belongs to | 默认值: public

table.name: table
table.description: Name of the table in which to update data in
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 作用: Name of the table in which to update data in | (必填项)

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for rows to update. You can use type casting with colons (:) like id:int.
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 作用: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for rows to update. You can use type casting with colons (:) like id:int.

updateKey.name: updateKey
updateKey.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id".
updateKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Key | 作用: Comma-separated list of the properties which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id". | 默认值: id | (必填项)

returnFields.name: returnFields
returnFields.description: Comma-separated list of the fields that the operation will return
returnFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return Fields | 作用: Comma-separated list of the fields that the operation will return | 默认值: *

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: mode (值: None) - The way queries should be sent to database. Can be used in conjunction with **Continue on Fail**. See the docs for more examples
queryParams (值: None) - Comma-separated list of properties which should be used as query parameters
